title: Need Help with upgrade D: PLEASE
body:
My Specks are 
Gigabyte B85M-D3H
Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz
4.00 GB RAM
Intel(R) HD Graphics 4600
Cosair VS650 PSU 
1Tb Hard Drive 

I average 60fps on medium 
I wanna get more FPS. My budget is about $400 to $700

replies.body:
The human eye can't really notice anything above 25 fps. If you're getting 60 fps why would you want to upgrade?

If you need higher graphics but don't want an inconsistent frame rate, then set the frame limiter to something like 30 fps.

Aside from that, if you *really* need an upgrade, just buy a better graphics card. Your base system is good enough as it is, and $600 will get you a graphics card that can run League on High without any frame lag (unless it's a patch problem, lol).
